name: Curse of the Golden Dice
description:
A mysterious pair of golden dice bring a curse upon your ship. Survive its jinxes and fight off undying pirates!

Arrow keys to move, up and down to climb ladders, spacebar or X to jump

Z to pick up wood, release Z to throw

Throw wood at holes in the hull to repair them, or at enemies to throw them off the ship

Push barrels off the ship to keep it afloat

Captain Scurvy Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
